Summary: Star like very bright moving across sky quickly and then another one was right behind it.
divs: sighting detailsi was walking my dog at walnut hill park in new britain ct. this morning 9\2\2010 it was starting to get brighter out but sill dark. i noticed what looked like a star very bright moving quickly across the sky and as i looked again i noticed there was another one right behind it just as bright. i have seen satellites at night moving and these moved much quicker and they were much brighter. there was no sound and i could visually see that there was no body such as a plane. as they went by it seemed that the first one flickered to almost dissapeared. the trees got in my way to see any more. i looked for satellite flyby times on the internet in the area but couldnt find any at that time. they seemed to be even brighter than the iss! i wasnt afraid of these whatever they were but i am very curious as to waht they were..maybe they were satellites and maybe they werent .
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in New Britain
There were no other sightings in New Britain on or around September 2nd 2010
